La palmera imperial vale esta visita , y por la noche está preciosa con una iluminación que cambia de color
Recomendable un paseo tranquilo, sin prisas , disfrutarás !

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Fantástico jardín botánico con una historia interesante y muy bien cuidado. Lagunas con carpas y tortugas. Pavos reales y una colección de cactus impresionante.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Nos ha encantado, un precioso jardín y muy bien cuidado, nunca había visto Cactus tan grandes ni una palmera como la Imperial que es expectacular, y cantidad de plantas y flores, y unos Preciosisimos patos en sus bonitos Lagos, la verdad que si vienes a Elche esto no debes de perdértelo, y el precio son 5 euros ósea que muy bien, tienen una tienda de souvenirs en la que puedes degustar sus ricos Dátiles y el exquisito pan de higo!!! 👍👏👏👏👏👏
Os pongo fotos para que veáis que chulo !!!!

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Visitamos el jardín huerto del cura, en nuestra visita Elche, es una de las visitas obligadas en esta ciudad.

Es un jardín repleto de palmeras de diferentes lugares del mundo, todas muy bien señalizadas con carteles con el nombre la localización y el año.

El jardín está muy bien cuidado, hay pavos reales, que alegran el paseo, sobre todo cuando abren sus colas.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Bonito huerto de palmeras y plantas.
conteudo:
Bonito parque de palmeras y plantas. Extremadamente bien cuidado. Dudo que haya alguno así.
Entre otras curiosidades tiene palmeras dedicadas a personalidades destacadas. Aparte de su palmera imperial.
Merece la pena la visita.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
este jardin artistico Huerto del cura no es grande, pero hay muchas palmeras con historias, por ejemplo la palmera imperial, es precioso y impresionante! y hay muchos catus bonitos!!!
para mi es como un paraiso!

por cierto, cuando entra al jardin te va a sacar una foto, esta foto es para poner el un imán, puedes comprarlo en la tienda con tu foto encima

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Bonito jardín con muchas especies sobre todo palmeras y cactus, bien cuidado, pero pequeño por lo esperado, y un poco caro por lo que és.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Interesante. Si estas allí, merece la pena
conteudo: Un jardin muy bonito. Yo no lo encontré particularmente descuidado. Es muy agradable de ver. La palmera imperial, a quien le gustan las palmeras, una gozada...

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: visitamos este parque y a mi me encanto, fue algo diferente ver tantas palmeras y de tantos sitios diferentes.... tambien hay plantas de diferentes zonas de los paises

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Es un precioso jardin botanico,en el cual no te pudes perder su palmera imperial entre tantas maravillas de plantas;la entrada para adultos cuesta cinco euros y para niños 2,50 euros,la puedes sacar en la misma puerta en la taquilla y enfrente hay un parking para coches publico

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: El jardín está un poco descuidado pero es agradable pasear por entre sus árboles en pleno agosto ya que la temperatura es muy buena. Lo más resaltable es la palmera real de una tamaño que no deja indiferente a nadie.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Un bonito paseo entrpalmeras. Podía estar un poquito mejor cuidado. Es interesante. No dejar de ver la palmeras real.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Estupendo jardín que respira paz y tranquilidad y es un museo vivo de plantas, sobre todo cactus y destacando la palmera Imperial y sus 8 o 9 brazos, estanques y todo muy verde. Desde que fuimos tengo un llavero con mi foto al entrar, que hacen al momento. Vale la pena.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Decidimos volver después de algunos años porque nos dijeron que habían reformado los bungalovs.
Los salones y los jardines muy bien , pero las habitaciones dejan mucho que desear son pequeñas y el baño además de pequeño no está renovado.
Relación calidad precio poco aceptable.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Fuimos de excursión con el colegio
conteudo: Es un jardín más o menos rapidito de ver. Tiene algunas plantas curiosas, destacando por supuesto la Palmera Imperial.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Es una maravilla, se respira paz y tranquilidad. Evitar épocas de mucho calor pero voy con amigos que nos visitan siempre.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Es una delicia visitar este jardín privado muy bien cuidado, y pasear entre palmeras y entre todas destaca la Palmera Imperial.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: cuando se llega a elche lo primero es ir al HUERTO DEL CURA y lo demás puede esperar....., VER ,OLER,TOCAR,SABOREAR Y OÍR.. es una pena que no haya mas  sentidos! EL HUERTO DEL CURA lo tendria todos

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: La primera vez que llegue a este jardín me parecía estar en otro mundo. Qué maravilla! Rodeada de palmeras preciosas, increíbles . Me parecía estar en otra parte del mundo. Nunca creí que podía tener tan cerca un jardín tan maravilloso

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Un jardín maravilloso. Hay toda serie de palmeras y de cactus de todo el mundo. El lugar es precioso, limpio y muy ordenada. Fue maravilloso pasear por sus jardines.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Es bonito, está bien, tiene gran variedad de cactus, palmeras... También rincones agradables. Merece la pena pero la entrada es cara en mi opinión.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Increíble la cantidad de rincones que esconde el Jardín del hotel Huerto del Cura. Es espectacular pasear por él e ir encontrando las habitaciones a modo de cabañas, individuales o duplex. El gusto ha sido exquisito y el ambiente inigualable.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: El jardín es bonito pero entrada cara pensaba que era mucho mas grande la verdad enseguida das la vuelta y lo peor la de la taquilla una verdadera antipática y maleducada

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Una auténtica maravilla en medio de Elche. Tienen una inmensa variedad de plantas de todas las partes del mundo, debidamente identificadas para conocer su procedencia. Es realmente destacable su sección de cactáceas, que forman casi un pequeño bosque con gran número de especies. Así como la palmera imperial con sus 8 brazos. Todo ello intercalado con bancos y fuentes de agua que hacen un agradable paseo por la sombra de los árboles. Todo está muy cuidado y arreglado. Muy simpática también la presencia de pavos reales entre los caminos.
Dispone de una tienda también donde se pueden comprar recuerdos y/o plantas para llevar, sobre todo cactus. Tiene descuentos por estudiantes, jubilados, etc.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Es muy bonito, venden dentro dátiles estupendos, pero es caro. 15 eros una familia.. Para un paseo cortete...

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Todos los años celebramos el Congreso durante un fin de semana desde hace 19 años. Es ideal para ir con familia y niños.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Un bonito palmeral con cactus, aves y fuentes en el centro de la ciudad
conteudo:
Es el único huerto ilicitano de palmeras cerrado y de pago, algo caro, por cierto.
El huerto es de medianas proporciones (13.000 metros cuadrados, 1,3 hectáreas), pero reúne una impresionante colección de palmeras de todas las latitudes, otra de cactus, estanques y fuentes con plantas acuáticas y patos, zonas ajardinadas y toda una manada de pavos reales, varios de ellos albinos.
A la entrada, una reproducción de la Dama de Elche.
Y la joya, la palmera imperial de 8 brazos que puedes ver en las fotografías que adjunto.
Muy bonito y agradable, aunque necesita un mantenimiento más intensivo y una rebaja en el precio de la entrada.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Decidimos pasar el día con unos amigos en Elche y quedamos en este lugar. Ninguno lo conocíamos y como íbamos con niños pequeños pensamos que podía estar bien. La verdad es que nos gustó a todos. La entrada es un poco cara pero por un día... Los niños menores de 4 años no pagan. Te dan un plano en la entrada con los distintos sitios para ver. También te hacen una foto al entrar y luego puedes comprarla a la salida. El jardín no es muy grande pero es bonito y está bien cuidado (aunque mi hija se cayó de un banco que aparentemente estaba bien pero en realidad estaba roto, avisamos a la salida para que lo reparasen). La palmera imperial es espectacular. Algunos rincones son preciosos y como prácticamente estás a la sombre todo el rato se está muy agusto. Si quieres pasar una mañana tranquila y sacar fotos bonitas te lo recomiendo.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Un sitio pequeño pero con encanto, y la entrada por 3€ (si eres estudiante o tarjeta jove). Sitio relajante y rodeado de naturaleza, con tortugas y pavos reales, y algún loro que otro que está de paso.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: A pesar de que no es un botánico con multitud de especies sí que es un sitio precioso donde poder desconectar de la ciudad. Muy bien cuidado, limpio y con algunas zonas espectaculares. La entrada un poco cara pero prefiero quitarme un café y disfrutar de ver éste sitio.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Visita muy agradable e interesante. Gran variedad de palmeras, alguna de ellas muy curiosas. Bien cuidado. Merece la pena la visita.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Es una parte del palmeral que rodea a la ciudad de Elche. Se podría decir que una de las partes más cuidadas y bonitas. La entrada no es muy cara.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Sólo se salvan los cactus y la palmera imperial.
conteudo:
Como jardín está bastante bien, aunque no creo que valga los 5€ que te cobran por entrar. La variedad de plantas no es mucha, porque está todo ocupado por palmeras.

La zona que más impresiona es la de los cactus, ya que hay algunos enormes, de más de 5 metros, y son especies que no se ven mucho por aquí. La palmera imperial también es impresionante, pero parece algo desmejorada.

Le harían falta algunas mejoras, como el agua de los estanques o los bancos (que el mejor día se rompen).

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: El sorprendente Palmeral de Elche, referente natural europeo, alberga en su interior el jardín artístico nacional. Lugares únicos, rincones para enamorarse y naturaleza viva nos hacen disfrutar de este maravilloso lugar.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: No sé si es una sensación personal pero creo que cada vez que voy está en peor estado y es una lástima. El agua de los estanques cada vez más sucia y los jardines peor cuidados. Hacía unos años que no iba y es lo que me pareció. Veremos la próxima vez.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Es interesante como jardin: como palmeral, no es lo que me esperab. La Palmera imperial es muy llamativa.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Jardín bien cuidado y limpio. Ejemplares interesantes y variados (para este clima). Merece la pena. Parking gratuito al lado

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Jardín emblemático de Elche,recomiendo su visita al
atardecer.Suele haber menos visitantes.y es mucho más tranquilo

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Es un lugar agradable, tranquilo, en el que poder ir conversando,a la vez que se disfruta de la vegetación,la palmera imperial es impresionante, así como la historia que rodea los comienzos de este huerto
También encontrareis tortugas ,pavos reales,así como una zona de recuerdos y datiles
que están bueniiiisimos

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Un rinconcito encantador. No es un sitio muy amplio pero tiene una gran variedad de vegetación, para los que no conocíamos mucho de palmeras, un gran sitio para aprender sobre ello. Sitio relajante, tranquilo y muy bien cuidado. Para desconectar es genial. Lo visitamos por casualidad ya que íbamos de paso a la ciudad por motivos de trabajo y desde luego que repetiremos. Lo recomendamos.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Si vas a estar unos días en Elche tienes que visitar este jardín, disfrutar de la flora que tiene y del bello paisaje de palmeras. Sin olvidarse de ver, la palmera imperial.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Nos gustó mucho este jardín, súper cuidado, todo tipo de palmeras, con fuentes y pavos reales, una pareja de albinos y una familia al completo de los comunes, la estrella sin duda la palmera imperial con siete brazos de los cuales ya ha muerto uno.... el cartel informativo cuenta que la emperatriz Sissi vino expresante a ver este extraña palmera.... ÚNICA EN EL MUNDO...

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Totalmente paradisiaco. Es para disfrutar paseando por sus jardines, observando la gran variedad botánica que tiene. Muy cuidado y para deleitarse en cada rincón. Destaca la Palmera Imperial, icono de esta ciudad.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Si pasas por Elche no te lo pierdas, pero tampoco es cuestión de desviarse mucho del camino para visitarlo.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Si bien en principio cinco euros puede parecer caro para efectuar la visita, posteriormente pensando todo el trabajo que se tiene que hacer para mantener así de cuidado el jardín, no es en absoluto caro.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Nos gustó muchísimo, es un jardín estupendo para pasar un rato agradable y ver diferentes tipos de plantas.
Está muy cuidado, nuestros hijos lo disfrutaron mucho.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Merece la pena pagar los 5€ (por ser forastero) y los 2'5€ por ser ilicitano.

La duración, depende de lo que se entretenga uno, suele durar facilmente 1 hora

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Jardin maravilloso, excelente su cuidado, dentro de la ciudad, enfrente del Hotel Huerto del Cura, al lado del Restaurante el Extremeño.
Digno para pasar un dia agradable y muy confortable.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Felicitar al Chef del Restaurante El Huerto del Cura.
Increíble eclosión de sabores en sus platos.
La merluza con pan de gamba y cama de judías verdes con caldo de vieiras nuestro favorito.Todo!!!!
Postres buenísimos.
Esperamos volver!

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Precioso. Muy cuidado. Con muchas especies de palmeras y cactus. Muchos pequeños espacios que contemplar.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Nos levantamos con la idea de ir a Elche. Exactamente al Jardín del Huerto del Cura. Llegados allí hay un pequeño descampado pegado a la entrada que ejerce la función de parking (gratuito). Si no hay sitio para aparcar allí deberás buscar por las cercanías.
La entrada 🎫: 5 euros adultos, 2,5 niños. Eso sí, si eres ilicitano o perteneces a algún grupo ( estudiantes, pensionistas, desempleados) tienes descuento.
Una vez compras la entrada, foto al canto. Si te apetece, a la salida te la venden en forma de llavero, imán o calendario para la nevera. Otros cinco, seis euros más.
El jardin en si no es muy grande de ver, pero si interesante. Pavos reales pasean a sus anchas por allí y no te ponen pegas para fotografiarles. Cantidades de clases de palmeras, cactus 🌵 bastantes llamativos (algunos), estanques,.. Es agradable de ver. Unos pequeños puestos de venta de souvenirs ( desde productos típicos como el dátil hasta unas pequeñas Palmas en forma de broche).
Hay aseos. Ah! Una tiendecita donde personalizan camisetas, tazas, etc.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Una visita imprescindible para todo aquel que visite Elche, su palmeral y entorno cultural, junto a la ruta de los huertos de palmeras.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Es impresionante la palmera imperial.

La verdad que es muy bonito todo el parque con toda esas palmeras típicas de la zona y difíciles de encontrar en otro lugar de España.

Comimos en el restaurante del hotel huerto del cura y estuvo genial.
Totalmente recomendable

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: De todo Elche es una visita imprescindible. Elche es mundialmente conocido por su palmeral, el huerto del cura es un jardín muy bonito con todo tipo de plantas. Merece la pena verlo, por cultura y por su encanto. Tiene una réplica hermosa de la dama de Elche.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Es un lugar increíble, un jardín que dificilmente podrás visitar en otro lugar, lleno de especia botánicas y muy bien conservado, un vergel sin igual que debes visitar. Tiene una palmera llamada imperial, con siete brazos (palmeras ) que le crecen de su tronco por eso la llaman la palmera imperial, por eso y porque fue visitada por la Emperatriz Elisabeth de Austria (“Sissi”).
Además muchas especial de flores cuenta con una excelente colección de cactus, bosques de bambú, estanques, bosques de palmeras, pavos reales, esculturas, y tienda de recuerdos. Si lo visitas no te arrenpentiras.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Hemos estado varias veces en el Huerto del Cura y la mezcla de cactús con palmeras es espectacular. Tienes cientos de palmeras diferntes. El parque está muy cuidado y muchos rincones invitan a tomar preciosas fotografías. Sin embargo, al tratarse de una atracció de pago, y aunque la entrada no es cara, deberían cuidarse los detalles como los carteles informativos. Muchas estaban ilegibles. Tal vez ya solucionaron este tema.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: La fama de este Jardín se la lleva la majestuosa Palmera Imperial, que es un 'must' para cualquier visitante a Elche. Pero cualquier rincón de este jardín es precioso, merece la pena perderse por él una tarde y ver todos sus detalles.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Es el huerto de palmeras, donde se encuentra la Palmera Imperial, en honor a la emperatriz Sisi en su visita a la ciudad, tiene gran variedad de plantas botánicas. Vale la pena su visita y disfrutar del paseo.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Un auténtico jardín botánico con curiosidades
conteudo: En medio del palmeral el jardín aporta una nota de frescor, colorido y exuberancia. Interesantes ejemplares de plantas que merecen la visita. Lugar tranquilo y fotogénico en el que disfrutar de descanso o de un rato de lectura.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: un bonito jardin con mil curiosidades interesantes
conteudo: Lugar emblematico en Elche que te deja admirar sus mil rincones en un placido paseo entre palmeras, especiales sus cactus de multiples tipos, sus palmeras de mil formas y en especial la insignia  la palmera imperial unica en su especie. vale bien la pena el tiempo invertido en su visita y excelentes ricones para imperecedaras fotos....Ah pàra los nio informados, no buscar la dama de Elche ( en el museo Arqueologico Nacional- Madrid) pero si hallareis una replica preciosa para esa foto que os recuerde vuestra visita

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Que yo sepa esta foto es del Hotel Huerto del CUra y no del Jardín Artístico nacional Huerto del Cura. EL Jardín me atrevería a decir que es uno de los meojres de España por ser atemporal y por su variedad de especies que no en extensión, es más grande el jardín Botánico de Madrid aunque éste último es mucho más feo. Si vas a Elche el Jardín debes visitarlo.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Un lugar con un encanto especial
conteudo: Se trata de un jardín donde la protagonista es la palmera con una buena muestra de diferentes variedades y especies de todo el planeta, y, especialmente la palmera imperial: es un tronco del cual brotan varias palmeras; pero ello no desmerece la fenomenal colección de cactus, ficus y otras especies arbóreas y arbustivas.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Es un lugar paradisiaco,con una variedad de plantas impresionantes y es más conocido por su palmera Imperial que tiene unas 165 años y consta de 8 brazos.Esta foto es del Hotel Huerto del Cura que es un paraiso para las vacaciones,tiene aparte del hotel unas casitas rodeadas de naturaleza que son un encanto

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Realmente encuentro excesivo el precio de la entrada, 5 €. Tendria que ser gratuito. No se si sera municipal o de un particular, pero de todos modos creo que tendria que hacerse cargo el Ayuntamiento.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Este lugar es uno de esos que dependerá de cada viajero si visitar o no, realmente es un lugar muy bonito por dentro, donde la naturaleza y el diseño es muy llamativo, ademas cuenta con la palmera de Sisi o palmera imperial, que seria su gran atractivo, Pero segun mi punto de vista el coste es un poco elevado ( 5€) no se creo que este precio no justifica, OJO como digo depende de cada viajero, yo los pague y disfrute conociendo la palmera imperial, pero ya el resto creo que se puede ver en otros lugares y gratis. Por tanto debes evaluar muy bien cuales son tus prioridades antes de entrar.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Visitar este jardin en medio de la ciudad es un lujo que pocas ciudades tienen. Se respira relax, se ven especies de palmeras de todo el mundo. La principal la Palmera Imperial, una palmera de 7 brazos.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Lo que me gustó es la variedad de plantas y árboles, junto con su disposición y cuidado, que es destacable; y por supuesto, la presencia de agua por todas partes.
No sabría decir que es lo que no me gustó.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Se trata de un jardín privado con un montón de especies exóticas, especialmente una magnífica colección de cactus y palmeras. Es la 2ª vez que lo visito y lo he encontrado peor cuidado que hace algunos años, pero merece la pena, aunque la entrada es algo cara.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Visitamos el Huerto del Cura en invierno y aún así nos mostró todo su esplendor y cuidado, una seleccion de cáctus, palmeras, arbustos, y demás, cuidada y digna de ver.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Un vergel con las palmeras más bonitas que puedas imaginar. El conjunto cuenta además con dos hoteles y dos restaurantes que bien valen una visita a Elche

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Creo que es un lugar perfecto para visitar después de comer. Es un jardín precioso, que cuenta la historia de los llamados huertos de Elche. Es muy relajante, siempre y cuando a los jardineros no les de por limpiar las hojas con la máquina sopladora, que más bien parece una motosierra por el ruido infernal que hace. Quitando eso, es una visita recomendable.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Parada obligada si visitas Elche, amplísimo jardín con gran variedad de plantas donde la estrella es la palmera imperial.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: No era la primera vez que lo visitaba, pero no cansa, y al atardecer resulta precioso con sus palmeras con nombre y todo tan limpio y cuidado. No se puede visitar esta ciudad sin conocerlo. Imprescindible!.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Un bonito palmeral y jardin, bien cuidado. Su joya principal es una palmera con un tronco común, pero que luego se amifica en unos ocho brazos, que resulta muy llamtiva. Hay otros mucho típos de palmeras, arboles, e incluso cactus. Si se va a Elche merece la pena hacer una visita.
origem: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, España

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Un gran jardin que alberga en su interior una muy variada gama de vegetación. De entre la que cabe destacar su palmera imperial. Un lugar de sosiego y tranquilidad, dentro de la población ilicitana.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Lugar de visita obligada en Elx
conteudo: Jardín Artístico nacional que merece la pena visitar. Contiene el gran icono de la ciudad, la palmera imperial.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Jardines muy cuidados,
Fuentes espectaculares y una coleccion de cactus espectacular.
Indispensable su visita si vienes a Elche.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Un lugar mágico que derrama tranquilidad y sosiego. Es espectacular. Visita obligada cuando visitas Elche.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Es un jardin a lo bestia tiene un monton de especies de plantas distintas todo muy bien guiado y muy. cuidado parece que estes en un oasis y lo mejor la joya de la corona La palmera IMPERIAL.Todo en el centro de elche.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Es la joya de la corona del palmeral ilicitano, dentro del cual se puede contemplar la más bella de las palmeras (La Palmera Imperial). Imprescindible su visita

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Bellisimo y muy bien cuidado. El Hotel muy tranquilo. Todo parece colocado dentro de una organización botanico - ocio calculada y bien compensada. El silencio predomina, hasta que es roto por algun pajarillo. Un verdadero oasis en la ciudad....
Hay que volver sin duda alguna...

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: No está mal, pero el recorrido se puede hacer en muy poco tiempo. Quizás para los amantes de la botánica ...

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Decidimos pasar la mañana de un domingo viendo el huerto, es increíble la variedad de palmeras, y lo bien cuidado que está el jardín.
Lo que no me gustó es el ataque de la fotógrafa a la entrada, por lo menos podía avisar.
Por lo demás, es genial poder pasear por esos jardines.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: muy bien en todo divertido y bellísimo un bunen dia para pasar al aire libre con la familia la verda que se pasa bien y muy entretenido

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Me encanta pasear por este parque y observar todos los ejemplares de palmeras que nos ofrece. Butias, datileras, canariensis, palmitos,etc....
Muy recomendable de visitar, si vais a Elche lo recomiendo mucho.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Elche tiene los palmerales que son una gran experiencia de visitar, y el huerto del cura es un placer para los amantes de las plantas, un paseo para descubrir las diferentes especies y su belleza.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Todo es uncio en el huerto del cura, merece la pena ir! es un jardin botanico unico en la zona, muy bien segmentado, organizado y mantenido, con un buen numero de especies diferentes, ademas la familia Orts, que lo regenta siempre lo tiene al dia, con las ultimas novedades en marketing turistico

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Nice and quiet botanical garden with many palm trees and cacti. The entrance fee is 6 eur. The most interesting is the huge Imperial Palm.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Surprisingly positive experience. A great place to cool down in the heat and look at the wonderful plants and animals…and, of course, palms.

Only downside was that the speed of the website was slow, so the audio commentary never worked, but still well worth the time.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: The main attraction in Elche, in my opinion.
conteudo: Compact beautiful botanical garden with interesting history and great assortment of flora and fauna as well. Lovingly cared for and well laid out palm, cactus and pond garden.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: An oasis in the summer heat
conteudo: Such a beautiful place. Serene, green and lush with plenty of places to sit down in the shade as you contemplate the gorgeous palm trees and peacocks. Don’t miss the Imperial Palm Tree dedicated your Austrian Empress ‘Sissi’ who came to visit in the 19th century.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Second visit here. Easy to reach from Alicante by the commuter train, short distance. Elce is also a beautiful small town. Palm forest is remarkable but Huerto del Cura Garden is so beautiful. Green oasis with different garden sections. There is also a small kiosk with local palm tree products, honey...The highlight of the garden is the Imperial Palm Tree.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: A very well kept place with a wide range of plants architecture. If it's hot there are plenty of shady places with benches. Well worth a visit.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Well worth a visit . For a small entrance fee you can spend a leisurely hour ( or more) walking through the forest of palm trees and other tropical plants . There are various ponds with wild life as well as the peacocks roaming . Plenty of opportunities for fab photos . I’ve attached photos of the entrance as it easily missed . We parked for free on the streets about 5 min walk from the park

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This park is Absolute worth a visit and be prepared to spend an hour or two. Enjoy life under the palms, feed the fishes and look at the cactus garden in the rock area. This place is small - but beautiful. And the palm with 7 sisters is unique

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Magnificent garden with palms and cacti
conteudo: This is a superb garden with huge palm trees and cacti surrounding interconnecting pools and lakes. You have to pay for admission, but it is well worth the cost to wander around this beautiful garden.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We got there early and while it's not an enormous garden it is great. Some great water features ducks andd peacocks..... very quiet ... if you are early.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Spent a couple of hours in the gardens, huge cactus. The place was nice and shaded, we fed the fish and also saw the peacocks. Would have been nice if they'd had a cafe there.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This botanical garden is perfect for a hot day. Plenty of shade and sprinklers to cool off. Beautiful plants, trees are cactuses with handy nametags, and ponds with ducks, fish and turtles. There are restrooms and a souvenir shop where you can also buy refreshments.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Beautiful oasis in middle of town
conteudo:
Cost 5.30 euro to get in.
Beautiful park which UNESCO world heritage status.
Lots of seating areas.
Plants well labelled.
Definitely a must see

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Amazing botanical garden with beautiful specimens of cacti and palm trees. Royal palm is unique. Paradise for cacti lovers. Beautiful variety of big cacti plants. Nice place to hide from summer heat and enjoy in shade and tranquillity.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: A hidden gem in this wonderful, unspoilt town. Helpful & polute at the kiosk & the most amazing, tranquil place to spend a morning.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: One of the most beautiful places I have ever been !! Have visited this place 3 times ! Will go back ASAP !!

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Lovely Botanic Garden with amazing plants
conteudo: This is a lovely garden to spend an hour or two wandering around the palms, cacti and other tropical plants.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: A great escape from the city and all the noise. It's interesting to see palm trees from all around the world, but most of all, it's a really beautiful place.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Beautiful gardens opposite our hotel. A wonderful lush oasis, well worth a visit if you are in Elche.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: We took the tourist tram through this park
conteudo: The park is decent. Nothing special. We liked the palm garden better. We just took the little tourist tram ride through it and that was enough.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This is a very well laid out botanical garden. Loads a shade and a meandering path that is very relaxing. It only takes about an hour at a very leisurely pace. I am from California and it was interestling how much of the flora is the same. Yes, there are many beautiful palms but therre are some astounding cacti that are just ancient to be as tall as they are. If you are interested in horticulture you will love it. If you want a nice walk after lunch, this is a great idea. If you are from California and have been to the LA Botanical in Santa Anita maybe you wont be so impressed but myself and my Brittish friends enjoyed it. 5 Euro for adults and 3 for seniors.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Entrance cost only 3€ for pensioners and was worth every cent. Spent an hour going round the site and loved the palms, cacti and wild life (duck, blackbirds, fish and turtles. Did not spot the peacocks. Trees and cacti were amazing. Well planed out. Would return, maybe at another time of the year. Bought 4 cacti in the shop for 7€.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: If you think the Huerto Del Cura is just another garden that adds more palm trees then you're wrong. Yes, the Huerto is a palm garden, but there a numerous other plants to discover, all layed out in a very attractive way. That is why this garden is a Jardin Artistico Nacional!

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Relaxing walk in Huerto del Cura
conteudo: We had a nice walk in the park. It is easy to reach from old town or tourist info, 10 minutes of lazy walk. The park itself is very nice with many, many palm trees, frog pond, albino birds. It is certainly worth visiting having a small entrance fee.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This place may be the most beautiful garden in Spain ! This part of the palm grove has so beautiful trees ! Let's spend an hour or two in it !

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This is a relatively small garden/ park, stuffed with palms and cactuses, carp-laden ponds (there are ducks and terrapins too) and immensely well created - major trees are properly described, there is a route round the garden so you don't miss things, there are occasional statues - because of the nature of its planting its not particularly seasonal, so can be beneficially visited all year to great effect. If you like gardens at all - this is one not to miss here. There are great (free to visit) palm plantations around the town, but go here for stunning variety, well worth the entrance price.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We travelled from Torrevieja to visit, the first problem was actually finding the garden. We expected something rather larger and drove past it the first time without seeing it. There is no really convenient parking nearby but we eventually parked about fifteen minutes walk away. The gardens are well maintained, and there is a signposted path to follow, rather in the manner of a visit to IKEA, making the most of the limited area. I suppose that a visit of about an hour and a half would suffice, especially if you like palm trees.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This is a wonderful place to while away an hour or two. Some of the plants and trees are over 100 years old. Great value for money at only €5 each for adults.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: El cielo es un jardin (Heaven is a garden)
conteudo: Magnificent palm garden in Elche, “The Palm Capital of Europe”. This is a very well cared for, spectacular display of palms and other subtropical plants. The meandering paths provide awe inspiring discoveries around every curve. A highlight of our trip to the Alicante area. Will undoubtedly return some some day!

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Well worth a visit! Much larger than it looks from the gateway, with stunning examples of Mediterranean plants. Also, the famous Imperial Palm, is here and a curious albino peacock.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: An oasis NOT to be missed
conteudo: Its a small fee (E5) to enter this beautiful garden with massive amounts of palm trees, but please do it if you want a stress-down-session and some calm breathing. Even if Elche as a town is full of parks and palm trees, most of them with free access, and an exciting story behind it all, this sight is something extra as it also is inhabited by peacocks and have the famous Imperial Palm Tree as a main attraction; worth every minute, if you ask me; go enjoy!!

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Lush gardens with free entry - an oasis of quiet. It's not big, but well worth a leisurely walk in shade and sun.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This is a beautiful garden - easy to walk around and very peaceful. Beautiful palms a plenty! Plus a great cactus area too. If you’re staying at the Huerto Del Cura hotel across the road you get a ticket and save €1.50 each on entry! Well worth a visit.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Very quiet and peaceful. The selection of plants amazing. Well kept with good information about s pieces. The cacti fabulousl. Well worth the 5€ entry.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Nice relaxing way to spend an hour
conteudo: The garden is dominated by palm trees and could do with a bit more colour from flowers in bloom. Signage needs to be improved as walked past it twice.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: I nice peaceful place for nature lovers .Well worth the visit . A beautiful well maintained garden with amazing cacti.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A glorious relaxed environment in the city...great for the mind and spirit
conteudo: After a busy few days, we headed to Huerto Del Cura Jardin to relax and see some natural beauty. This is a place of solace in a crazy world. We loved wandering around, stopping and taking in our surroundings. A great experience for the whole family. The little shop at the end was a bonus to take away some souvenirs.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: The garden is a must if you are in the area. It is big enough to see all the fantastic palm trees and cactuses as well as other tropical plants. But it is not too big so you won't get tired of walking. The garden is perfectly maintained, I didn't see any withered leaves. If you want to find out more about palm trees and products made of them, there is a museum nearby.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: An unexpected treasure in the town!
conteudo: Had a bit of trouble finding the Palm Forest, but asked a few locals and eventually found it! 5 Euros each (3 Euros for pensionistas!) For a small charge you can hire an audio guide but, to be honest, it's just lovely to wander around. There is a big range of palms, including a unique 7 pronged one over 100 years old, a cactus area and an unusual water feature. I also saw some white peacocks for the first time in my life! There is a little shop selling local products (mainly date products) and ice lollies. You can easily wile away a couple of hours here and, if you are in the area, it's well worth a visit. It's open all day.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We found the place based on the information on the guide book. The garden is nice but we thought that it would be much bigger. It took us only approx 30 min to walk around. Fee was 5€/adult and 2,5€/child.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
What a treat ! After having spent a Cultural morning at some of the amazing museums in town we made our way to this beautiful little park.
It was perfect to relax and stroll round this extraordinary place.
The park is wonderfully maintained and easy to go around.
Definitely a “must” if you’re in Elche!

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We spent a couple of hours wandering around this fascinating tropical garden. While not particularly knowledgeable about plants and trees, it was interesting to see all the different specimens, including the Imperial Palm, and also a sculpture of La Dama de Elche.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: A very attractive and well maintained garden. Whilst relatively small it is tranquil with lots of interesting areas and good plantings. Lots of shade and seating.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A small private garden with a lot to enjoy !
conteudo: The garden is opposite the wonderful hotel which holds the same name Huerta del curo and 1 mn walk from the small museum of the palm. It is absolutely charming and worth visiting when they is not a big coach of tourists ! Its displays of cacti is amazing with use of ponds and water features. The main attraction seems to be the imperial palm tree of course but there is much more to see in this garden . A small shop has some souvenirs, ice creams and hot drinks and seeds/plants to buy.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
We visited Elche specifically to see this garden and were not disappointed. The place is tranquil, shady, well maintained. Whilst the palms are the main focus of the garden, the other aspects are really well executed. The cactus garden is very impressive, with some nearly as tall as the surrounding palms. We were there at the wrong time of year for the water lilies and lotuses, but the ponds still had interest.
Highly recommended.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: I stumbled across this stunning hotel on booking.com. Unfortunately I only stayed one night with my mum but I could have happily stayed forever. The gardens, the food, the service and the decor are all impeccable. Coming back ASAP.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This lovley tranquil garden was a haven from the afternoon heat. We were kept amused by the resident peacocks antics. Their little ones were quite sweet. There were lovely vistas every where you looked. We went late in the afternoon after all the tour coaches had gone and there was only a few other people there. There is a kiosk there which is where we saw the peacocks hanging around.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Tranquil haven in a busy city
conteudo: Beautiful gardens with a wide range of trees and plants, including its famous imperial palm and amazing albino peacocks. A lovely place to while away an hour or so.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A Perfect Oasis in the Middle of the City
conteudo: This is a beautiful garden shaded by numerous magnificent palms. The borders and paths are kept pristine and the plants are well tended. If you are in Elche this is a ‘must see’. A stroll around the garden will take a maximum of an hour and the entrance fee is a few euros. In the warm weather this would be a virtual oasis

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: What an extraordinary experience! Wandering through this lush, tropical oasis in the middle of a good sized city

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Although small, this garden is so full of wonderful plants and animals you can spend a couple of hours walking through.

Well worth a visit

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A Beautiful Garden in the City of Elche
conteudo: This is a lovely garden to visit for round about an hour. It has arrows to follow in order to see the entire garden. I wouldn't normally be keen to be so 'managed' and follow a route, however this works really well and ensures you miss nothing. The trees are all clearly labelled, the garden is beautifully manicured and it also contains a whole range of Mediterranean and tropical plants. It is well worth visiting if you love gardens. It has benches dotted around and I would imagine would be a cool retreat in the middle of a hot Summer, I visited in December when it was bright and cool.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This place is beautiful. We stayed half board for one night so we could explore the area. It's very relaxing, the staff are friendly, and the setting surrounded by palm trees is stunning. The rooms are lovely as was the evening meal and breakfast.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Stayed here several times for work. This is a fabulous hotel in a central location and you would never know from the green surroundings that this is in the middle of town its so quiet. Food is great and staff are lovely.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: what a beautiful place to visit!
conteudo: This is not a big garden, but a very unlikely garden to find in a city centre. The amazing range and species of plants are incredible and to think they have been there for centuries! We visited in November so it was very quiet and very peaceful but the grounds are kept to the highest of standard. well worth a little visit.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: millions go to Central Park in New York City, Presidio in San Francisco and 100's of other city parks around the world, i have never visited one that i was over whelmed with what is there. Elche contains the best free municipal parks i have enjoyed.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Only a small garden, but absolutely immaculate to wander round, with an outstanding area of cacti. We were impressed with Elche in general, but this garden really was the high point of the visit.
I would agree with several other reviews that the signage could be improved on, if you are not a botanical wizard it's a bit confusing as to what you are looking at sometimes.
There is a small souvenir shop which sells cold drinks which was welcome in the heat. Entry cost 5 euros / person which was a little pricey.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We didn't know what to expect and were amazed by this iImmaculately kept garden, one of the best I have ever been to. The specialisation as you would expect in Elche are palms but they also had a great collection of Cacti. Everything was well laid out. They could improve on the signage on some of the plants.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
I'm really not sure what to make of this place. Some elements were lovely, others disappointing.

I had emailed in advance to let them know I wouldn't be arriving until really late. Check-in was quite smooth, but when I got to my room it was like a sauna. Clearly the air con was not working, so back to reception. By now someone else was checking in, so had to wait 10 mins. Explained the problem, and they sent a handy man to the room, who didn't seem the most clued up individual, and eventually confirmed what I had told them - it was broken !! So back to reception again. Other 10 minutes waiting for another customer to be served, before finally getting a different room over an hour after I'd first arrived.
Despite not getting into my new room until after 1am, when I asked for a late check out, was bluntly told no.

The rooms are okay. I couldn't work out they were tatty or rustic .. I think probably a bit of both. I will say the bed was lovely and comfortable, and big.

I didn't have any food, so comment on that.

The pool area was very nice, but the pool itself somewhat chilly.

Checked out and asked about a bus to the airport, as I had plenty of time. Was sent to completely the wrong place, so ended up walking a four mile round trip, to get to a bus stop that was 5 minutes away the hotel !!
If you do want to get an airport bus, go to the stop at junction of Juan Carlos and Calle De Daoiz. It really is just a few minutes walk from the hotel and then takes about 30 minutes the airport, and cost only 1.5 Euros. Theres only one an hour. Bus 1B !!
Just to warn you there's no info at the bus stop about that service, but it does stop there.
How hotel staff don't know where to get an airport bus is beyond me.

As for Elche itself, I liked it, although was only there for a day. It's got a lovely Spanish feel, despite its proximity to alicante. Not a British pub in sight thank god.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: In the heart of the historic city of Elche this sublime botanical garden is dedicated to the palm and other Mediterranean and desert plants. Small enough to get around and see most if it in half an hour. Lots of people do but thats to miss the point of this place. My advice? Go early evening as the heat is going out of the day, wander slowly among the beautifully tended plants nad trees, soak up the calm and serene atmosphere. You will not regret a single moment spent in this special place. Then pop across the road for a drink on the deck of the bar in the HOtel Huerta del Cura.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: An oasis of calm in a busy city
conteudo:
Whilst staying inland with friends we visited Elche to see these gardens. They cover only 13,000 square metres, but within that area over 1000 palm trees grow. In addition other species such as lemon, orange and pomegranate can be found.

The pathways meander around the park, past ponds and small waterfalls. The Imperial palm tree is well over 100 years old - apparently is was mentioned in Baedekers Tourist Guide in 1908!

You can rush round and see a lot in twenty minutes. But far better to stay and drink in the peace and tranquility, take your time, look at the various species and relax. Small children can be kept entertained by the ponds, watching the pond life quietly.

This park is worth a visit. I intend to come again. And the bar next door serves good tapas and sandwiches.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We visited Elche during our holidays in Alicante. Our travel guide book recommended Elche as having UNESCO listed palm tree forrest. We got a bus from Alicante (which cost 2-3 euros). I would recommend to go the Tourist information there to collect map and ask for recommendations (as it is a huge place). Then if you do not have time to walk all around Elche - just go straight to this place. It is a summary of all palm tree forrest. Not a very big place - but so nice, calm, tidy, beautiful. I highly recommend that place.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Palm trees - the pride of Elche - cacti and beyond Even an albino peacock that was starting down on us as we approached the gate. Place full of history and must see if you are in town or nearby

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Still as good when last here
conteudo:
Stayed here for 3 days prior to flight home was very relaxing even got rained on 2nd day sitting next to pool under a parasol reading for 30mins slight breeze made things pleasant.
Room was large and well cleaned every day, plenty of seats and tables ,storage good with small fridge,good bathroom goodies and a (bidet) air condition works well although the control had a slight rattle. did not eat here liked going out for meals.
Reception had a slight problem with our passports and there reading machine, but they did resolve after a good few minutes. Car was parked in the underground car park so cool when needed but 13 euro per day.
The great thing is the hotel is in the center of Elche and shops and restuarants are all within 15 mins walking so yes we will be back.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
We visited the gardens as part of a day in Elche. We parked in the underground car park SABA at Cases Mare de Déu, 03202 Elche. It has very good clean loos and is right next to the tourist information kiosk. The tourist officer gave us a booklet and leaflets of recommended places to visit. He suggested we visit the Basilica Santa Maria first and then catch the road train, which took in the Municipal Park, the El Huerto del Curo and the Palm Grove. This was excellent advice. Whilst waiting for the train we walked through the Municipal Park, which offered shade under the many and varied trees and plants. We boarded the train just outside the Park (& Tourist info office) and it set off through the park where we got a multi-lingual commentary. The train then took us through the streets to the El Huerto del Curo. The train stops about 100 metres from the gardens. We alighted and planned our visit to last an hour so we could get on the next train and finish the tour. The gardens, which are relatively small (13,000 sq mts) are an amazing collection of cacti, palm and citrus trees, flowers, terrapins, carp and peacocks.
For your €5 admission you get a useful guide book and a numbered walking route so you don’t miss anything. At the end of the walk there is a well-stocked shop with reasonably priced refreshments. You can stay as long as you want and there are plenty of seats where you can chill out.
We left and hopped back on the road train which then trundled along to the Palm Grove. You can walk or cycle through the palms but it was very hot and the terrain in places looked uneven so we let the train take the strain. The train affords you a good view of many of the 200,000 trees. On returning to the tourist office we looked for a nice café and can recommend Cerveceria La Surena in Plaza Congreso Eucaristico, which is opposite the Basilica Santa Maria.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Thousands of palm tree variations - the best horticultural garden I have been to this far.

On your stroll around the garden you may bump into a few peacocks who colour the garden some more.

Entrance is 3.50 euros if u are staying at Huerto Del Cura and 5 Euro otherwise.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Lovely and relaxing place, with many kind of palms and other plants. Good to take a walk here and spend some time relaxing. There are some part that seems forgotten but mostly are good.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: I am lucky to say I come for work, though this is an ideal place to stay if you were on holiday in Elche. The staff and restaurant is above class. The rooms are a great size within the palms. They have a spa for massaged sauna which makes my work more enjoyable after a long day. The town centre is only a few streets walk away.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Tourist train saves the walk in the heat. The garden is only a couple of minutes walk from the museum.
The Imperial Palm Tree -the 'vegetable candelabra' is of course the main attraction but the garden is full of horticultural 'eye candy'
A place to sit and relax before you head back up to town on the tourist train to visit the MAHE and Altamira Palace.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Had a walk around these beautiful gardens this afternoon. Very peaceful and lots of lovely plants and palm trees.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: There are few so beautifull gardens on the world. If you can to Elche, you cannot miss this treasure.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Weird, Wonderful, Spiky, Dates - an oasis of cool on a hot day!
conteudo:
I have gait/walking challenges (stroke), all sightseeing has to be well-researched and not overly taxing; I wear a legbrace. A short walk from the centre, the Huerto del Cura (The Priest's Garden), declared a National Artistic Garden, is like an oasis in the middle of built-up spaces and buildings. Serene ponds and fountains, I liked the Bust of Dame de Elche, nestling by the side of pool - very calming on a hot day. As you go further into the garden, there're stepping stones across a pond, very helpful signage for identifying trees; there are seat benches to sit and cool off – very peaceful.

Bring hats/caps, water, comfy shoes for walking. It's hard, stony ground in some areas, but walkable. Cacti gardens; amazing variety. Weird, wonderful Imperial Palm (Palmera Imperial) has 7 arms growing from a single trunk, like a candlelabra. Roaming around the gardens are peacocks, calling to one another – sure wakes you up! Great experience, cool oasis of calm and peace.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: On a day visit to Elche which we thoroughly enjoyed visiting, we ended up at these gardens. Delightful surprise, very well kept area, lots and lots of plants and palm trees and a famous 7 branch palm tree. It is not an enormous garden but big enough, we are not garden experts so we didn't look at the name of every plant. What was lovely is the peace, the serenity, in the middle of a city. At 5 euros it was worth every penny/euro. By the way you get your photo taken as you go in, yes very touristy but you know what i bought it, i was very pleased with my 5 euro magnet and photo. Regret a bit now i didnt take the keyring as well. Don't miss a visit !

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: One for keen gardeners but beware of the ticket man
conteudo: THe priests palm and cactus garden is nice enough, and very well kept, but perhaps best for someone's who really wants to see the labels on different kinds of trees. I had walked all over the city with my map to find this and before I even got inside, I fell foul of the furious man in the ticket booth. THere were only a handful of people in the garden so surely he can't have been overwhelmed by the stress of it. He came to the window from the back of the room, and told me off in a torrent of fast Spanish -after I had managed to say I did not speak Spanish - for putting coins in a ticket stile against advice from a complicated notice which was not obvious unless you looked for it - and read Spanish well. Maybe he has not got his head round the idea of having foreign visitors? Not a great start. A young man seemed to be taking photos of the scene behind me at the entrance and later I found he was doing it to sell key rings with the faces of visitors photographed as they came in. I should have said yes to mine for the record of the fright and embarrassment that was probably still on my face. It always baffles me when someone like this is convinced that a tourist is making a mistake on purpose to upset them.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This garden highlights the treasure that the Palmeral is to Europe and Elche. It is a fine botanical garden, but an exceptional exhibit of a grand palmier, and it includes an excellent cactii collection.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
I stayed here many times a class hotel with fantastic palms tree gardens
small bungalow bedrooms all dotted in the gardens
Lovley pool always a bit cold
I also stay in their sister hotel milenio
You see the lady owner she checks everything every day
She's on it that's why they are so good
Also the staff have been there for years

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Interesting to a point, but ultimately this garden has little to offer to those who don't value date palms.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Beautiful gardens with a staggering amount of curiously grown palm trees, its name is the Curates garden so a lot of religious connections but it makes it interesting. Whilst on the tour you probably won't notice that a video is being made, at the end of the tour you go to a cinema room and watch a video, little knowing that you will be on it, opportunity to buy it at the end of the screening 2.5euros - cheap!

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: this a fascinating gardens which in the heat of the summer was cool and refreshing. With the machines available you could hear in your own language the history of the various plants and palms, how they either arrived at its name or postilion within the gardens.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Awesome collection of palm trees and cactuses
conteudo: I have to admit that I did not know about the Huerto del Cura before coming to Elche, therefore I was amazed to find such an awesome collection of palm trees and cactuses. Absolutely worth the visit.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We visited for a weekend and this park was the very best Elche had to offer. We loved it so. Much we visited twice despite the entry costing 5 euros. I would definitely recommend it to anybody visiting this lovely town.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Elche has a lot of different huertos but this is the most well preserved. It is a nice place to visit and relax in a hot summer day in Elche and you can find different kinds of trees in a nice and lovely area.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: In a unique setting in the center of ELCHE is this garden of palm trees, cacti. It is well maintained offering a cool and shady respite during the summer. Most of the palm trees and cacti are labeled. The jewel of the garden is the Imperial Palm Tree which is shaped like a candelabra. Within this small garden are sculptures, a rock garden with various types of cacti, ponds and a small chapel. Parking is across the street in the hotel parking lot. There is a small fee for the parking and entrance to the garden.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: well worth the visit to see the extraordinary collection of palm trees from around the world
conteudo: Beuatifully maintaniled and landscaped gardens that are tranquil and cool especially when the open at 10am

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Located in Elche town (Elx). Easy to reach By Cercanías C1 train from Alicante train station to Elche Parque station, it takes 26 minutes. Huerto del Cura is perhaps the most famous and beautiful park of Elche Palm Groves, which are Unesco World Heritage Place. You will find the most unique Palm tree there, The Imperial Palm Tree with seven suckers/branches from the same trunk.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: The types of fruit trees are impressive. We walked and enjoyed the breeze. The grounds are well maintained. I recommend getting a cappuccino at the resturant right outside the park.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Elche is palm groves, palm trees wherever you look. this beautiful, relaxing town has this to offer in addition to the UNESCO Huerto del Cura. This garden has some of the tallest and oldest trees including the Imperial palm tree and also other tropical plants and cactus. Well worth a visit.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Vigilar los ladrones del parking! Watch out for the thieves at the parking
conteudo:
El jardín está muy bonito con tortugas, peces, pavos reales (también blancos) y plantas muy lindas. Pero en el parking de al lado nos podrían haber robado todo del coche, han abierto y han mirado las cosas, parece que no nos quitaron nada a nosotros pero no dejar nada de valor allí. O aún mejor, no deje el coche allí.

The garden is very beautiful with turtles, fish, peacocks (also white) and very beautiful plants. But in the parking lot next to it, they could have stolen everything out our car, the thieves have opened and have looked at the things, it seems they did not remove anything from us but do not to leave anything of value there. Or better yet, don't even park there.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This beautiful little park is declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO. It was an extremely hot day when we visited and arrived just after it opened at 10a.m. It was lovely to walk around in the shade of these magnificent palms and huge cactus all coming into flower. The first thing I caught sight of was a beautiful White Peacock and the second was a Peahen with her chicks - I have never seen peacock chicks before and there were several Peahens with their chicks - very sweet. Ponds with fish and terrapins all very peaceful and lovely, A Shop and small nursery when you leave where you can purchase souvenirs and lovely dates. It was quite beautiful.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Fabulous gardens right in the city very well worth a visit.The most amazing palms and cacti a beautiful oasis.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: 5€ for adults. Lots of Palm trees and some peacock chicks. Mini water features with frogs and turtles. A cooler place to be on a hot day

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Small attractive garden full of different types of palm trees, many dedicated to notable figures either in history or film and planted by them. A good place to picnic.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Fantastic well manicured garden of palms and cacti
conteudo: We came to this garden on a cruise ship tour from Cartegena. We spent an hour in the garden and could have spent more. We had a guided tour that increased the value of the experience. There is a (5 euro/ 3 euro concession) if you are on your own. The trees and plants are spectacular so make sure you have your camera. This is a must see if you are in southern Spain.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: hotel has beautiful, lush grounds, large pool, cabana-like hotel rooms and great breakfast. As well, a wonderful sunday brunch in the restaurant. I stayed two nights for a wedding over palm sunday weekend and would recommend the hotel.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Very interesting place for a walk. Entry fee for adult is €5
I recommend to explore and find all hidden places.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A peaceful place in the city
conteudo: I would definately recommend to visit this lovely and very peaceful botanical garden. They have some amazing plants and even peacocks walking around.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Just because of beauty of plants
conteudo:
We came to the garden by car and it was very hard to find parking place although it was low season. We found a very tight place for a car just by the garden where is a small parking lot.

The garden is like a green oasis with all palms, cactuses, pond, animals and other plants. It gives nice shade in a sunny day. Area is not so big and easily walked through in an hour. The best part with kids was a pond with turtles and birds. Also cactuses and palms are gorgeous. Other parts are bit boring offering nothing really interesting than an atmosphere.

Whole area is easily accessible by prams and wheelchair. There are toilets and cafe/souvenir kiosk. The reason to came here is just a great scene of all these trees and plants. Unfortunately we didn't go into Parque El Palmeral which you should check also.

We tried also find a lunch place in Elche but it was really hard. There was only cafes and couple of not so good looking restaurants around the square in city center.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: The gardens are beautifully kept they include lots of tropical varieties of trees. It is free to enter, the irrigation system is quite unusual.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A tranquil haven, worth visiting to view the amazing Palm Trees
conteudo: We love visiting Elche, shopping at the shoe factory and being amazed at all the leather goods on sale. A short drive away are these gardens which offer a tranquil oasis where you can sit and admire the lovely gardens

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: It is actually the only place in Elche where you are supposed to pay for seeing palm trees. There is one special shaped palm tree here, and the garden is surely nice, but you can get the same visiting the municipal park after ten minutes walking and there it is free of charge.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
In the middle of this garden is a palm tree with a difference. From a main trunk, eight separate trunks or limbs shoot off at different angles to make eight palm trees, this is quite impressive as I have never seen this anywhere else. Unfortunately there are only seven now as due to weight one branch fell off.

Around the grounds are nice ponds and waterfalls and everywhere of course Bird of Paradise flowers. There is also a small shop where you can buy trinkets etc.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A stroll admiring God's handiwork in palm trees and various types of cactuses
conteudo: As part of a world heritage site this park is beautiful. It is an oasis of peace (except for the class of elementary school kids who were slightly ahead of us :-) !!) in the middle of a lovely city. Priced at 5€ per adult (the audioguide being extra) it seems just a tad bit overpriced. If one is part of a group (min. 20) then the admission price is drastically reduced (2,80€ I think). Still strolling the park, admiring the various types of palm trees and the cactuses was an hour well spent.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: I never realised there were so many different types of palm trees, fascinating. I liked the way it was set out and easy to walk round. It's amazing how old some of these palms are. There is a section of cacti which is interesting too. A must visit if you are in Elche. Only disappointment was there was nowhere to sit and drink your coffee!

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: What a beautiful garden in a city centre! Not a large space but a true haven of peace. Excellent array of exotic plants, water gardens and sculpture with a historical content too. This was the main purpose of our visit to the Alicante area and we were delighted to have our expectations fully realised. This is truly a must-see if you are visiting Spain in the Costa Blanca or surrounding areas.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This is a garden that can be visited over and over again. We live 40 minutes drive away in a coastal town and it is always a joy to visit. You can park in the Hotel Huerto del Cura just across the road (you have to pay of course) and you can use the Hotel bar and restaurant if you wish. On this occasion we were staying in the Hotel for a special occasion and spent one morning in these famous gardens just across the road.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Excelente y relajante.Exelant and relaxed place
conteudo:
Bonito lugar, Buena comida, excelente lugar para descansar.
Lo recomiendo.

Nice place to stay, wonderful and relaxing.
Good food and beautiful views.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: It was really worthwhile to spend an hour or so in this oasis of green when so much of the area is just scrubland and near desert.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Great Hotel in the heart of Elche
conteudo:
This hotel is good for business as well as tourist's, it has a pool, nice rooms and plenty of space to relax, just a short walk from the town, here you can find bars restaurants etc.
The staff are friendly and polite and the rooms are quite large and very clean with AC when needed.
The breakfast in nice, but the restaurant in the evening although very good is just a bit basic... but with lots of great restaurants near by you will have no problem with food.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This can be a little difficult to find but do persevere. Only 13,000sq metres in size it has a huge range of species on display, as well as the ubiquitous 1,000 odd palms. Peaceful, shaded and surprisingly uncrowded it is a gorgeous spot to while away at least an hour. Of course it is more of a creation than the mny other Huertos in this town of several hundred thousand palm trees but this only serves to add to its beauty. Well worth seeking out.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Great hotel, in a great position. Staff are excellent and everything is clean and tidy. The surroundings are beautiful and the food excellent.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Rare collection of Palms and Cactis in the heart of Elche
conteudo:
This is a must see attraction if you are in the area. For a very small fee you are transported into a very peaceful world of over a thousand palms and cactus all set in beautifully landscaped gardens with ponds, bridges and a signposted walkway.
Allow about an hour to to see it all, more if you want to sit and relax amongst the majestic palms. Here you will find the famous 'Kings Palm' which sprouted 7 suckers after a short period of growth, now fully supported by a sturdy metal frame. The dates from this palm were reportedly supplied only to the Royal Household.
There is also a magnificent display of giant Cactus which are best observed from the bridge over the pond.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Silence, perpetual greenery, flowers, pools and streams and, of course, palms, thousands of them, and in hundreds of shapes and sizes. Only the traffic noise at some points will remind you that you're in downtown Elche, not the Garden of Eden.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: What a place ! We went to visit after seeing the recommendation on here. One of the most peaceful places that I have been to. Beautiful landscaping so unlike any garden you would find in other Spanish parks. We had a 3 year old who loved looking at the turtles fish and peacocks. I will be going back in the very near future.

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Visited here in August with my partner. We both enjoyed walking around (which took around an hour at a very leisurely pace). Plenty of different palms and cacti to look at and a few ornamental ponds and water features dotted about with fish and terrapins in.
Lots of places to chill out in the shade too and just take in the peaceful surroundings. There's also,a little gift shop area selling cacti and touristy gifts. It didn't seem very expensive either.
The only thing that I didn't like was that as we entered the gardens we had a woman almost dive on us to take a photo (this was to try and sell you a key ring as you left), also there seemed to be an excessive amount of rubbish bins in the garden (getting in the way of my touristy photos lol).
All in all a worthwhile look round and happy we did it

estabelecimento: Jardín Artístico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
A very good place, only took about an hour to look around. Many varieties of palms and cacti set in beautiful surroundings. Lovely gift shop and the dates are gorgeous.
